description:
Usuzumi Hatsumi is a third year of Eisui Girls` High School, plays vice-captain position. Her ability, called the "Gates of Evil", makes it easy for her to gather north and east tiles, and to a lesser extent, south and west tiles, as a reference to misfortune hailing from the northeast. With her ability, every time she`s in the north position, she has a higher chance of playing the Little four winds or the Big four winds yakuman. She is referred as Deadly Storm.
Source: Wiki
name: Usuzumi Hatsumi
